column1: Little Goat Diner////The 3 of us ended up ordering the special omelette (which came with smoked salmon I believe)
column2: this little piggy went to china (my dish)
column3: and the parathas burrito. Food came out in what felt like 10 minutes or less
column4: super savory-looking and actually in the perfect portion. My dish was a little on the salty side
column5: probably from the heavy chili garlic chive sauce
column6: but I enjoyed the biscuit and 2 perfectly-cooked eggs
